post.description:
Progress the brand to the next status in the creation workflow.

The status progression follows this sequence:
NEW → QUESTIONNAIRE → SUMMARY → JBTD → CREATE_SURVEY → COLLECT_FEEDBACK →
FEEDBACK_REVIEW_SUMMARY → FEEDBACK_REVIEW_JTBD → FEEDBACK_REVIEW_ARCHETYPE →
PICK_NAME → CREATE_ASSETS → PAYMENT → COMPLETED
Analyze the feedback for a brand and suggest how to proceed
Produce brand name options for a brand

Generate a URL to redirect users to the domain provider for domain registration.

Supports multiple domains simultaneously for most providers:
- GoDaddy, Namecheap, Porkbun, Cloudflare: Full multiple domain support
- Other providers: Best effort support
Upload audio file and process it to text directly
Upload audio file and start processing it to text

post.description: Suggest changes to the brand JTBD drivers based on user's feedback

Create a payment checkout session for a brand.

This endpoint creates a checkout session using the specified payment processor
and returns the checkout URL where the user should be redirected to complete payment.

Query parameters:
- payment_method: Preferred payment method (credit_card, paypal, google_pay, apple_pay)
- processor_type: Specific processor to use (stripe, paypal, authorize_net)

get.description: Get details of a specific payment
List all payments for a specific brand

schema.title: Response List Brand Payments Api V1 0 Brands  Brand Id  Payments Get

get.description: List all payments for the authenticated user

schema.title: Response List User Payments Api V1 0 Payments Get

get.description: Check if payment has been completed for a brand

Get available payment methods and processors.

Returns information about which payment methods are currently available
based on the configured processors.

Available payment methods include:
- credit_card: Traditional credit/debit card payments
- paypal: PayPal payments
- google_pay: Google Pay digital wallet
- apple_pay: Apple Pay digital wallet

post.description:
Produce brand assets for a brand.

If asset_type is specified, only that specific asset type will be generated.
If asset_type is None, all missing asset types will be generated (existing assets are preserved).

Returns a reduced list with ID and type only to minimize data transfer.

get.description: Get a list of brand assets with ID and type only
Get a specific brand asset by ID
